nodes.text: Peder Pedersen (born April 26, 1971) is a director of humorous music videos, commercials and animated shorts.

In 2008, he worked on the LEGO/Indiana Jones mini-epic, Lego Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Brick (2008). It led to the follow-ups LEGO Star Wars: The Quest for R2-D2 (2009) and LEGO Star Wars: Bombad Bounty (2010).
